welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Discover Zéphyre, your versatile platform that combines innovative services and unique experiences. Explore our different sections to learn more about our projects.

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description: Join our gaming community with our premium Minecraft server. Explore infinite worlds and live epic adventures with other players.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.description: Our projects are powered by modern technologies: Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud-native infrastructures for optimal performance.
